General.Name: Crown Baus Capital Corp
General.Description: Crown Baus Capital Corp. does not have significant operations. It intends to become an acquisitions-based company targeting high tech industries and financial services. The company was formerly known as Cannabis Capital Corp. and changed its name to Crown Baus Capital Corp. in June 2014. Crown Baus Capital Corp. was incorporated in 2011 and is based in Surrey, British Columbia.
General.Address: 2383 King George Boulevard, Surrey, BC, Canada, V4A5A4
